content.data: When the form of one will be considered and seen as One and no other thought will come into the mind and keeping one objective before oneself, the mind will not run anywhere else, then the Lord (Nath Niranjan---the unmanifested Brahman).179.
ਤਦ ਹੀ ਉਹ ਨਾਥ ਨਿਰੰਜਨ ਨੂੰ ਪ੍ਰਾਪਤ ਕਰ ਸਕੇਗਾ ॥੧੭੯॥
